english.segment1: Praise to the Lord, our chains are gone. Cant help but sing our freedom song. Praise to the Lord, our chains are gone. Cant help but sing our freedom
english.segment2: I am a child from a broken home. Where true love was torn apart. But then I met a Heavenly Father. Who made a home inside my heart
english.segment3: I am a man with the chains of addiction. Dragging me down for way too long. But I came face to face with redemption. And now those chains are gone
english.segment4: Can anybody hear me?. Does anybody know what Im talking about?. When youve been delivered like that
english.segment5: Youve got to shout it out. Lift your hands up in the air. Shout Hallelujah. Lift your hands up in the air. I have been set free
english.segment6: I am a sixteen year old daughter. Lost in the mirror, no self esteem. But God made me in His image. And that makes me a beauty queen
english.segment7: I am a wife and the mother of three. Trading my dreams for a busy life. Searching for my lost identity. And Im happy to announce that I found it in Christ
